data.name: Fall of Kings : Domination
data.detailed_description:
The world is on the verge of collapse, people are eaten away by hatred and resentment. Kingdoms are rising and war is now upon you.

Choose your side, forge alliances, and craft powerful and unique decks to triumph!

Unique game system


Choose to face your opponents in your own style. To achieve this, you can use intrigue, to sink your target into instability and revolt (spies, rumors, traps, plots, assassinations etc ...) or military force by crushing your enemies in bloody battles (Siege weapons, soldiers and special units, brutal or vicious strategies etc ...).

An exciting deck building system


Remove, duplicate or upgrade your cards, collect artifacts and passive bonuses.
The cards have many abilities for great interaction and the achievement of powerful combos.

Never play the same game


The number of parameters that can influence your games is huge:

* Over 300 upgradeable cards
* 10 playable kingdoms with their unique decks
* Choose an ally and collect their cards to create unique mixes
* Gain experience and unlock new cards
* Unlock prestigious "Hero" cards and unlock new possibilities for your clan
* Over 30 "event" cards (good and bad) that will modify your battles
* Over 100 artifacts with powerful passive modifiers
* More than 20 random historical events with choice
* 30 levels of Domination (difficulties adding modifiers)

Total immersion


Every card, every effect, every skill is cleverly linked to the historical context, you play cards, but these cards tell a story!

data.short_description: Fall of Kings is the new representative of roguelike strategy deck building games. In a medieval Europe on the brink of chaos, play as a mighty king and use intrigue or force to triumph over your opponents.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese
